194707.「改めて 紹介するね。\n みんな もう知ってると思うけど\n ピンチョの婚約者:
Let me reintroduce myself. As you all probably
know by now, Pincho's fiancee...Fajita.

194709.「私 あのヒト……ピンチョを助けたいの。\n アンタ達に 協力するのは\n 利害:
I want to help Pincho. I'm helping you because
it's in our mutual interest. That's all.

194710.「……あのキェルグって悪魔は ３つの秘宝を\n ほしがっていたわ。そのうちの ふ:
The demon Devil Kyerug wanted the three
treasures. Two of them are already in his
possession.

194711.「アンタ達も知ってのとおり 双角のかぶとと\n 虚無の瞳が それよ。きっとヤツは:
You all know the Horned helmet and the eyes of
emptiness. He will come for the other one.

194712.「残りのひとつは 風の腰布と呼ばれる物で\n ドルワーム水晶宮の 王立研究院にあ:
The other one, called the Wind Cloth, is in
the Royal Research Institute at Dolworm
Crystal Palace.

194713.「キェルグは その３つを使って\n 天魔クァバルナを 復活させるつもりよ。\n:
Kjerg is going to use those three to revive
Kukulkannibal. That's why we're going to do
everything we can to stop them.

194714.「もちろん 身体を乗っ取られてしまった\n ピンチョのことも 救出するわ。:
And of course, I will rescue Pincho, whose
body has been taken over.

194715.「……私も行くわ。悪魔のチカラが無くたって\n ここにいる ボンクラどもよりは\:
I'll go with you. Even if I don't have demon
powers, I'll still be more useful than all
these idiots here.

194716.「だっ……誰が ボンクラだッ。\n <pc>の大親分に 負けた分際で！！\n こ:
Who's a fool? You're the one who lost to the
big daddy of <pc>! You Puttsun bitch!
You have no friends!

194717.「……言葉には 気をつけることね。\n そのクチを 二度ときけなくする方法ぐらい:
Be careful what you say. I know plenty of ways
to make sure you never hear that mouth again.

194718.「もちろん あなたにも 来てもらうわ。\n キェルグについて 一番くわしいのは\:
Of course, you'll have to come too. You are
the one who knows the most about Kjerg.

194719.「<pc>。私はファヒータと一緒に行くから\n ドルワーム水晶宮の 王立研究院で:
<pc>. I'll go with Fajita and we'll
meet up at the Royal Research Institute at
Dolworm Crystal Palace.

194720.「風の腰布は レモモという研究員が\n 管理しているわ。\n 先に着いたら 彼女:
Wind Cloth is managed by a researcher named
Lemomo. Talk to her when you get there first.

194721.「大丈夫？ <pc>。\n ピンチョ……というか 悪魔キェルグが\n 部屋から:
Are you okay? <pc>. Pincho... or
rather, Devil Kyerug, ran out of the room,
but...

194722.<pc>は\nレモモに化けた 悪魔キェルグに\n風の腰布を盗まれたことを 伝えた:
<pc> informed that the demon Kyerug,
disguised as Peach, had stolen his Wind Cloth!

194723.「フン……。\n これで クァバルナを呼び出すために必要な\n ３つの秘宝は ま:
Hmmm... So now the three treasures needed to
summon Quavarna have been stolen.

194724.「キェルグは クァバルナ復活のための儀式を\n どこかで するはずよ。\n それ:
Kjerg is going to perform a ritual somewhere
to resurrect Kavaluna. We have to stop them.

194725.「問題は あの悪魔がどこへ行ったのか\n わからないということ……。:
The problem is that we don't know where that
demon went...

194726.「……そういえば アイツ\n ボロヌスの穴の奥にあるっていう\n 海底の牢獄への:
Oh, by the way, he wanted to know how to get
to the Undersea Prison, which is located at
the end of the Hole of Voronus.

194727.「私は そんな場所 興味なかったから\n テキトーに 聞き流してたんだけど たし:
I wasn't interested in that kind of place, so I just kind of tuned it out, but I think there's a story there about a girl who wanted
to reconnect with someone she cared about...

194728.「ファヒータ！ その情報 とても役に立つわ！\n あの悪魔はきっと 海底の牢獄で:
Fajita! That information is very useful! I bet
that demon is going to resurrect Quabarna in
his Undersea Prison.

194729.「<pc> 覚えてるよね？\n あなたが最初に クァバルナを倒した場所よ。:
<pc> You remember, don't you? That's
where you first defeated Quabarna.

194730.「フン。それじゃあ さっそく そこへ行って\n アイツを切り刻んでやれば いいの:
Hmm. So we should just get out there and cut
him up right away, right?

194732.「……ちょっと 考えがあるの。\n <pc>は 先に海底の牢獄へ向かってて。\n:
I have an idea. <I want you to head to the
Undersea Prison first. Fajita, will you come
with me?

194733.「誰が アンタの言うことなんか……って\n 言いたいところだけど アンタのことだ:
I'd say, "Who cares what you say?" But since
it's you, you're probably up to something
again, aren't you?

194734.「いいわ。乗ってあげる。\n アンタのその悪知恵には\n さんざん してやられた:
All right. I'll give you a ride. I've had it
up to here with you and your wiles.

194735.「ふふっ。ありがとう ファヒータ。\n それじゃ <pc>は\n 先に 海底の牢:
Phew. Thanks, Fajita. Well then,
<pc>, go ahead and head to Undersea
Prison.

194736.「向こうでは 何が起こるかわからないから\n 準備は 万全にして行ってね。\n:
You never know what might happen over there,
so be prepared for anything. See you later!

194737.「オン マルィーヤ……。\n ダマトゥーン サラトゥーン\n ザワン イサ クァ:
On Maluiya... Damatun saratun zawan isa
quabarna...

194738.「永劫の輪を巡りし 我が主\n 天魔クァバルナよ……。今ふたたび\n その御身:
O Kukulkannibal, my Lord who has travelled
through the eternal circle, reveal yourself to
me once more in this land.

194739.「お……おお…………。\n その 美しいお姿を 目にすることを\n どれほど 夢:
Oh... oh... how I dreamed of seeing your
beautiful figure!

194740.「お待ちしておりました クァバルナ様……。\n あなたの忠実な下僕 キェルグでご:
We have been waiting for you, Master Quabarna
your faithful servant, Kjerg. Together we will
destroy this continent!

194741.「……我ガ 従僕 キェルグよ。\n このたびの働きヲ まずは ほめてヤロウ。\n:
My servant Kjerg. Let me begin by praising you
for your work. You did well...

194742.「ハッ。ありがたき お言葉……！: Ha. Thank you for your kind words...!

194743.「我のために ここまで尽くしてくれる\n 従僕は貴様だけダ……。さア 久しい再会:
You are the only servant who has done so much for me... now we meet again for the first time in a long time. Let me see your true form
before me...

194747.「天知る！ 地知る！ 人ぞ知る！: Know the sky! The earth knows! Man knows!

194748.「美少女怪盗団 ポイックリンズ！\n トリオになって\n 華麗に 参上でございま:
The beautiful thieves, the Poiklins! We are
the trio, and we're coming to you in style!

194749.「ふたりとも！\n 早く ピンチョを安全な場所へ！: Both of you! Quick, get Pincho to safety!

194750.「キェエエーーーッ！？ なぜダ！\n なぜ お前らが ここにいるッ！？\n 召喚:
Keeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee eeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! Why are you here? Why are you here! The summoning ceremony must have
been Hit without a doubt!

194751.「ふふ。本当に 私が ３つの秘宝を\n みすみす 盗まれたと思っていたの？\n:
Hmm. Did you really think I would let the
three treasures get stolen? I knew your
intentions from the beginning.

194752.「あなたが盗んだ 双角のかぶと 虚無の瞳\n 風の腰布……。あれらは全て あらか:
The Horned helmet you stole, the Eyes of
Emptiness Wind Cloth... they were all things
that I had replaced with fake ones in advance.

194753.「秘宝がなければ クァバルナも復活しない。\n つまり あなたの作戦は\n 最初:
Without the treasure, Quabarna will not be
resurrected. In other words, your plan was
dead in the water from the very beginning!

194754.「キキェーッ！？\n あ…悪魔をダマすなんて\n なんて 極悪なヤツらなんですカ:
Kikie! How diabolical of them to trick the
demons!

194755.「私を怒らせたことを あの世で\n たっぷり 後悔させてやりマスヨッ！！\n キ:
I'm going to make you rue the day you ever
made me Angry! Keeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!

194756.「クソッ！ 高貴なる 悪魔の私が……\n こんな小娘に 敗れ…る……など……。:
Shit! How could I, the noble demon, be
defeated by such a little girl?

194757.「ファヒータ……。\n そ…その いろいろと ごめん。: Fajita... well, I'm sorry for everything.

194759.「いいの。もう 気にしないで。\n 私にも いたらないところがあったのだから。:
It's okay. Don't worry about it anymore. I had
my faults too.

194761.「私って 一度こうだと思い込むと 他のことが\n 何も 見えなくなってしまうから:
Once I'm convinced of something, I can't see
anything else... I've lost sight of true love.

194762.「でも今回 あなた達に 助けられたことで\n 誰かを 本当に愛するっていうことが:
But this time, with your help, I realized what
it means to truly love someone.

194763.「うん ぼ 僕も そうなんだ。\n だから もう一度……。: Yeah, me too. So, once again...

194764.「もう 迷わないわ……。\n 優しくて 強くて かっこいい\n 私の運命のヒト…:
I won't get lost anymore... he's kind, strong,
cool... the man of my dreams...

194769.「今回 自分より 頼りがいのあるヒトに\n リードされているうち\n 今までにな:
This time, as I was being led by someone more
dependable than myself, I began to develop
feelings I'd never had before...

194770.「だから 婚約のことは もういいの。\n お互いスッキリ 水に流して 忘れましょ:
So let's forget about the engagement. Let's
just forget about it and let bygones be
bygones!

194772.「ふふ。ひとまず 一件落着……\n って とこかしら？:
Hmmm. I guess that settles the matter for
now...is that right?

194773.「一度 クァバルナが 復活してしまえば\n それを封印するために\n 必ず 誰か:
Once Quabarna is resurrected, it will always
require someone's sacrifice to seal it...

194774.「いろいろ黙っていて ごめんね。\n それでも 協力してくれて ありがとう。:
I'm sorry for not telling you. Still, thank
you for your cooperation.

194775.「本当だよ！ 水くさいねえ！\n ヒーローってのは 孤独なモンなのかも\n しれ:
It's true! You stink of water! Maybe it's
lonely being a hero, but...

194776.「もう あたい達３人は 美少女怪盗団\n ポイックリンズの 仲間なんだから\n:
We three are already companions of the
beautiful girl thieves, the Poiklins, so don't
keep it to yourselves!

194777.「ふふっ。ありがとう ダルル。\n それじゃ最後に いつもの\n いってみましょ:
Phew. Thanks Darul. Let's do the usual for the
last time then!

194778.「それでは皆さん ごきげんよう。: Well then, good day to you all.

194779.「チリも残さず\n キレイに退散ですわっ！: We left clean and without a speck of Chiri!

199198.「そして <cs_pchero>。\n これは 私たちからの お礼よ。\n よか:
And <cs_pchero>. This is our way of saying
thank you. You can receive it if you like.

199199.「だから もう二度と\n そんな犠牲を 出させたりしない。\n あのとき 私は:
That's why I won't let you make that kind of
sacrifice again. That's what I swore to myself
back then.
